thread.title: Sebastien Ogier takes control of Spanish Rally
thread.title_full: Sebastien Ogier takes control of Spanish Rally

title: Sebastien Ogier takes control of Spanish Rally
text:
Sebastien Ogier takes control of Spanish Rally 24 Oct 2015 17:46:53 
comments 
Volkswagen's Sebastien Ogier ended the second day of RallyRACC Catalunya-Costa Daurada with a healthy lead of nearly a minute over team-mate Jari-Matti Latvala. 
Ogier claimed five wins from Saturday's eight stages to build an advantage of 54 seconds going into the final day. 
A mistake on the day's third stage, SS12, cost Latvala dear as he lost 50secs when forced to drive with a flat tyre after hitting a concrete block and smashing a wheel. Related Sport News
